description: A Prometheus metric dashboard for go-ethereum, supports all blockchains compatible with go-ethereum

targets.expr:
sum(rate(geth_rpc_requests_success{quantile='$quantile', instance="$instance"}[5m])) by (chain, instance, method) 
/ 
sum(rate(geth_rpc_requests_success_count{instance="$instance"}[5m])) by (chain, instance, method) /1e6 
< 1e200

sum(rate(geth_rpc_requests_failure{quantile='$quantile', instance="$instance"}[5m])) by (chain, instance, method) / sum(rate(geth_rpc_requests_failure_count{instance="$instance"}[5m])) by (chain, instance, method) /1e6

title: Go-Ethereum-By-Instance
